Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Navigation

  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    Navigation class for Pacman (is a kind of GPS) Creates Routes and calculates distances

      • precalcallroutes

        public Route[][][][] precalcallroutes()
        Precalculates all possible Routes in the Game-Grid
        Returns:
        A 4-D Route-Array where [Y-Start][X-Start][Y-Goal][X-Goal]

      • getMovinglist

        public boolean[][] getMovinglist()
        Returns:
        A 2-D Boolean Array where [Y][X] True == Actor can move False == Actor can't move
